name: K-array Lyzard-KZ1 I
headline: Ultra-miniature stainless-steel line array
description: The Lyzard-KZ1 I is an ultra-compact line array element in a CNC-machined stainless-steel enclosure for discreet foreground sound.
story: Created for interiors where you see architecture, not loudspeakers, KZ1 I disappears into millwork and fixtures while preserving speech clarity and sparkle.
definition: Ultra-miniature passive line-array loudspeaker for premium, design-driven spaces.
specs: Matches K-array subs for full-range systems

lifestyle.alt: Lyzard-KZ1 I ultra-miniature loudspeaker on surface mount
Lyzard-KZ1 I in a refined interior

name: K-array Lyzard-KZ1R I
headline: Recessed ultra-miniature line array
description: The Lyzard-KZ1R I adds a recessed mounting frame for invisible integration into walls, ceilings or millwork.
story: For interiors where every grille line matters, the KZ1R I vanishes into shadow gaps while maintaining the same micro-line performance as KZ1 I.
definition: Ultra-miniature recessed line-array loudspeaker for invisible integration.
specs: Optimised for speech and soft music

lifestyle.alt: Lyzard-KZ1R I recessed into wall panel

name: K-array Lyzard-KZ14 I
headline: Extended micro column with higher output
description: The Lyzard-KZ14 I extends the Lyzard family with a taller column for greater output and throw from the same micro form factor.
story: When KZ1 disappears too easily and you need more impact in the room, KZ14 scales up the line source while keeping the same jewellery-like finish.
definition: Extended ultra-compact line-array loudspeaker for higher output applications.
specs: Multiple micro drivers in a taller column

lifestyle.alt: Lyzard-KZ14 I installed in premium bar
Lyzard-KZ14 I detail against stone surface

name: K-array Lyzard-KZ14R I
headline: Recessed extended micro line array
description: The Lyzard-KZ14R I offers the KZ14 column with a recessed frame for seamless integration into walls and ceilings.
story: Designed for interior architects who demand a continuous skin, KZ14R I hides the hardware but leaves the soundstage intact.
definition: Recessed extended micro line-array loudspeaker.
specs: Tall stainless column for greater output
Suitable for speech and background music

lifestyle.alt: Lyzard-KZ14R I integrated into ceiling bulkhead

name: K-array Kobra-KK52 I
headline: Compact stainless-steel line-array column
description: Kobra-KK52 I is a slim stainless-steel passive column with closely spaced drivers for controlled, elegant coverage.
story: From historic chapels to couture boutiques, the KK52 I delivers a tall, even sound field from an architectural column barely thicker than a hand.
definition: Compact passive line-array column for design-sensitive installations.
drivers: Multiple small full-range drivers in a slim column
specs: Pairs with K-array subs for full-range systems

lifestyle.alt: Kobra-KK52 I in a retail environment
Kobra-KK52 I installed beside architectural columns

name: K-array Kobra-KK102 I
headline: Full-height stainless-steel line-array column
description: Kobra-KK102 I doubles the height of KK52 I for greater throw and consistency in tall or reverberant spaces.
story: Where speech intelligibility is everything, KK102 I builds a taller line source to keep energy on the audience and off reflective surfaces.
definition: Full-height passive line-array column for demanding architectural and worship spaces.
drivers: Extended column of small full-range drivers
specs: Works in distributed and point-source systems

name: K-array Vyper-KV25 II
headline: Compact flat-panel line-array column
description: Vyper-KV25 II is a slim aluminium column with a flat front grille, designed to disappear alongside architectural lines.
story: Where the wall detail is razor-sharp, KV25 II hugs stone, glass or timber and throws a controlled sound field down the room.
definition: Compact flat-panel passive line-array loudspeaker.
specs: Multiple colour options to match interiors
Mounts flush to walls and columns

name: K-array Vyper-KV25R II
headline: Curved-ready flat-panel column
description: The Vyper-KV25R II adds a mechanically flexible rear plate to follow gentle curves in façades and interiors.
story: Architectural lines are rarely perfectly straight; KV25R II bends visually with features while keeping its acoustic performance intact.
definition: Flexible flat-panel line-array for gently curved mounting surfaces.
drivers: Multiple full-range drivers in flexible chassis
specs: Designed to pair with compact subs

name: K-array Vyper-KV25W I
headline: White flat-panel column for wall mounting
description: Vyper-KV25W I offers the compact KV25 column in a white finish for seamless blending into light interiors.
story: From galleries to residential living rooms, KV25W I takes the visual weight out of the sound system.
definition: Compact white flat-panel column for discreet wall reinforcement.
specs: Ideal for speech and background music
Matches white décor and trim details

lifestyle.alt: Vyper-KV25W I in white gallery wall

name: K-array Vyper-KV52 II
headline: Medium flat-panel line-array column
description: Vyper-KV52 II is a taller flat-panel column for more output and throw while preserving the razor-slim profile.
story: Ideal for hospitality and showrooms where you need punch and projection but refuse to compromise on the architecture.
definition: Medium-height flat-panel line-array loudspeaker.
specs: Pairs with subs for full-range systems

lifestyle.alt: Vyper-KV52 II installed alongside décor panels

name: K-array Vyper-KV52F II
headline: Flush-mount flat-panel column
description: Vyper-KV52F II is a flush-mountable version of KV52 II for in-wall or in-panel integration.
story: For interiors where the speaker must sit flush with cladding or joinery, KV52F II frames the column into the surface.
definition: Flush-mount medium flat-panel line-array loudspeaker.
drivers: Array of full-range drivers behind flat grille
specs: Compatible with K-array amps and DSP

lifestyle.alt: Vyper-KV52F II flush in architectural panel

name: K-array Vyper-KV52FR II
headline: Flush-mount column for curved façades
description: Vyper-KV52FR II adds flexible mounting to the flush KV52F format for subtle curves and complex surfaces.
story: Façades and feature walls rarely stay flat; KV52FR II gives designers freedom to follow those lines with a continuous sound source.
definition: Flexible flush-mount flat-panel column loudspeaker.
drivers: Array of full-range drivers with flexible frame

name: K-array Vyper-KV52R II
headline: Flexible flat-panel column
description: Vyper-KV52R II is the flexible variant of KV52 II for surface-mount applications along gently curved structures.
story: Handrail, balcony, contour wall – KV52R II follows them gracefully, keeping the column visually continuous.
definition: Flexible surface-mount flat-panel column loudspeaker.
specs: Flexible rear chassis for gentle curvature
Works with K-array subwoofers and amps

lifestyle.alt: Vyper-KV52R II mounted along a curve

name: K-array Vyper-KV102 II
headline: Full-height flat-panel line-array column
description: Vyper-KV102 II is a tall flat-panel column that maximises line-array behaviour for large and reverberant spaces.
story: KV102 II is the go-to when you need high intelligibility and coverage in grand lobbies and halls without heavy loudspeaker profiles.
definition: Full-height flat-panel line-array loudspeaker for demanding installations.
specs: Wall, pole and flown mounting options

name: K-array Vyper-KV102R II
headline: Flexible full-height flat-panel column
description: Vyper-KV102R II combines full-height output with a flexible chassis for curved or non-linear architectural features.
story: For long, flowing lines of audio, KV102R II tracks the building geometry while maintaining a continuous column.
definition: Flexible full-height flat-panel line-array loudspeaker.
specs: Flat front grille to follow curves
Available in standard and custom finishes

name: K-array Kayman-KY52
headline: Compact aluminium line-array column
description: Kayman-KY52 is a passive aluminium column providing high intelligibility and throw from a discreet, slim profile.
story: Designed for venues that need more punch than micro-columns but demand the same visual restraint.
definition: Compact passive line-array column for installed sound.
specs: Works with K-array subs as main system

name: K-array Kayman-KY102
headline: Full-height aluminium line-array column
description: Kayman-KY102 doubles the height of KY52 for higher output and longer throw in challenging acoustic spaces.
story: A favourite in reverberant venues, KY102 keeps energy on the audience and off the stone, glass and marble.
definition: Full-height passive aluminium line-array column.
specs: Tall aluminium enclosure with multiple drivers

lifestyle.alt: Kayman-KY102 detail of grille and enclosure

name: K-array Kayman-KY102-EBS
headline: Kayman column with extended bass shading
description: Kayman-KY102-EBS introduces an extended bass shading configuration for improved low and low-mid control.
story: Optimised for installations where low-mid build-up must be carefully shaped without sacrificing clarity.
definition: Kayman-KY102 variant with extended bass shading configuration.
type: Passive line-array column with extended bass shading
drivers: Column array with shaded low-frequency elements

name: K-array Domino-KF26
headline: Ultra-slim passive full-range loudspeaker
description: Domino-KF26 is a compact, ultra-slim passive loudspeaker for front-fill, distributed and surround applications.
story: When you need the simplicity of a full-range box but want a flat, unobtrusive profile, KF26 is the go-to choice.
definition: Slim passive full-range loudspeaker for distributed applications.
drivers: Coaxial full-range driver with passive acoustic design
specs: Can be paired with subs for extended LF

name: K-array Domino-KFC26
headline: Ceiling-ready ultra-slim loudspeaker
description: Domino-KFC26 adapts the KF26 into a variant optimised for ceiling or specific architectural mounting.
story: For open ceiling grids and low visual-impact installs, KFC26 blends with luminaires and services.
definition: Ultra-slim passive loudspeaker variant for overhead or special mounting.

name: K-array Domino-KF210
headline: Compact full-range loudspeaker with deeper LF
description: Domino-KF210 adds more cone area and depth versus KF26 for higher SPL and deeper low-frequency response.
story: For front-of-house in intimate venues, KF210 behaves like a compact main while keeping a flat aesthetic.
definition: Compact passive full-range loudspeaker for mains and fills.
specs: Wall, ceiling and yoke mounting options

name: K-array Domino-KF212
headline: High-output slim full-range loudspeaker
description: Domino-KF212 is the largest Domino model, aimed at high-SPL applications with a still-slim visual profile.
story: It behaves like a compact club box, but visually stays aligned with Domino’s flat, minimal design language.
definition: High-output passive full-range loudspeaker.
drivers: Larger cone complement with HF section
specs: High SPL capability from slim form factor
Works with subs for club-level systems

name: K-array Tornado-KT2
headline: Miniature point-source loudspeaker
description: Tornado-KT2 is a compact, high-intelligibility loudspeaker for foreground and effects in design-driven spaces.
story: With a form factor reminiscent of a downlight, KT2 fits where traditional boxes never could.
definition: Miniature passive point-source loudspeaker.
specs: High intelligibility for voice and music
Can be ceiling or surface mounted
Matches K-array subs for LF support

name: K-array Tornado-KT2C
headline: Ceiling-format miniature loudspeaker
description: Tornado-KT2C adapts the KT2 into a ceiling-format device with integrated mounting for overhead use.
story: When you want audio and light language to align, KT2C looks at home among downlights and pendants.
definition: Miniature ceiling-format point-source loudspeaker.
specs: Works with K-array subs for additional bass

name: K-array Python-KP52 I
headline: Medium-format line-array column
description: Python-KP52 I delivers strong pattern control and output in a medium-height column for demanding installs.
story: For live and installed PA where sightlines are tight, KP52 I gives a clean vertical column with serious throw.
definition: Medium-format passive line-array column loudspeaker.
drivers: Array of full-range drivers in slim enclosure
specs: Line-array pattern with narrow vertical beam
High SPL capability for its size
Pair with subs for extended LF

name: K-array Python-KP102 I
headline: Large-format line-array column
description: Python-KP102 I is the larger column in the series, with greater driver count and throw for primary PA duty.
story: Used as mains in medium venues, KP102 I projects articulate vocals and music with a tall, controllable beam.
definition: Large-format passive line-array column loudspeaker.
specs: Tall extruded enclosure with many drivers
Narrow vertical coverage for reverberant rooms
Rigging options for flown or ground-stacked use

name: K-array Anakonda-KAN200
headline: Flexible rope loudspeaker
description: Anakonda-KAN200 is a 2 m flexible loudspeaker that can wrap around structures, railings and fixtures.
story: Born to solve ‘where do we hide the speaker?’ KAN200 literally bends around the architecture.
definition: Flexible modular loudspeaker for distributed and creative installs.
specs: Modules can be linked for longer runs
Can be used standalone or with subs

name: K-array Anakonda-KAN200+
headline: Flexible loudspeaker with extended bandwidth
description: Anakonda-KAN200+ is an evolution of KAN200, offering refined performance and presets for more demanding applications.
story: Keeps the ‘rope of sound’ concept but tightens performance for modern BGM and light foreground systems.
definition: Enhanced flexible loudspeaker module with refined response.
specs: Flexible 2 m module with refined tuning
Compatible with K-array subs and processing

name: K-array Anakonda-KAN200+8
headline: Extended Anakonda system segment
description: Anakonda-KAN200+8 is a flexible loudspeaker segment that integrates into extended Anakonda system runs.
story: Used where long lines and complex paths of audio are required while preserving Anakonda’s visual lightness.
definition: Flexible loudspeaker module optimised for extended arrays.
specs: Flexible module for extended array chains
Mechanical and acoustic continuity with KAN200+
Mounting accessories for railings and structures

name: K-array Dragon-KX12 I
headline: High-power point-source loudspeaker
description: Dragon-KX12 I is a versatile, high-output point-source loudspeaker for live and install applications.
story: Combining a compact footprint with tour-ready output, KX12 I is equally at home as a monitor, main or powerful fill.
definition: High-power point-source loudspeaker with flexible mounting.
specs: Pairs with KXT subwoofers for full systems
Robust finish for touring or install

name: K-array Dragon-KXT12P
headline: Companion 12" passive subwoofer
description: Dragon-KXT12P is a compact, high-performance passive 12" subwoofer voiced to pair with KX12 and related systems.
story: It provides the low-frequency foundation for Dragon rigs in smaller venues and portable applications.
definition: Compact 12" passive subwoofer for Dragon systems.
specs: Optimised for pairing with Dragon tops

name: K-array Dragon-KXT18P
headline: High-output 18" passive subwoofer
description: Dragon-KXT18P is a powerful 18" passive sub designed to extend Dragon systems into full concert-duty low-end.
story: For venues that need chest-hitting low frequencies, KXT18P anchors the low end under Dragon arrays and stacks.
definition: High-output 18" passive subwoofer for Dragon and larger systems.
specs: High power handling and SPL capability
Rugged finish for touring or fixed install

name: K-array Firenze KH8
headline: Firenze line-array module
description: Firenze KH8 is a high-performance line-array element within the Firenze touring system family.
story: Born for large-scale productions, KH8 brings Firenze’s precision and Italian design language to stadium and arena sound.
definition: Touring-grade line-array module with Firenze acoustic signature.

name: K-array Firenze KH7P I
headline: Powered Firenze point-source module
description: Firenze KH7P I is a flexible point-source module with touring output and Firenze system integration.
story: It bridges the gap between traditional point-source and modern array philosophies with Firenze control.
definition: Powered point-source loudspeaker within the Firenze ecosystem.
drivers: High-power multi-way system with onboard amplification
specs: Flexible rigging for arrays or point-source
Suitable for touring and fixed install

lifestyle.alt: Firenze KH7P I as point-source module
Firenze KH7P I in touring application

name: K-array Firenze KS7P I
headline: Powered luxury installation speaker
description: Firenze KS7P I combines Firenze acoustic heritage with integrated amplification for high-end installations.
story: It focuses the Firenze sound on projects where architectural integration and premium finishing are key.
definition: Powered luxury installation loudspeaker from the Firenze family.
drivers: Premium multi-way system with onboard amplification

lifestyle.alt: Firenze KS7P I in luxury retail
Firenze KS7P I installed on column

name: K-array Firenze KS7
headline: Luxury passive architectural speaker
description: Firenze KS7 applies Firenze acoustic thinking to a passive loudspeaker for design-led architectural installs.
story: Ideal where you want Firenze performance but prefer external amplification and processing.
definition: Luxury passive installation loudspeaker within the Firenze line.
specs: Supports a variety of mounting schemes
Pairs with Firenze and K-array subs

name: K-array Firenze KS8
headline: Premium passive luxury speaker
description: Firenze KS8 offers enhanced performance and luxury finishing above KS7 for more demanding spaces.
story: It sits at the premium tier of Firenze installs, where both sound and finish must be uncompromising.
definition: Premium passive luxury loudspeaker.
specs: Pairs with matching subs and processing

name: K-array Firenze KX12F I
headline: Flagship luxury installation system
description: Firenze KX12F I is a flagship Firenze installation loudspeaker, combining high output with refined aesthetics.
story: Designed as the top of the Firenze install tree, KX12F I carries concert DNA into luxury commercial and residential environments.
definition: Flagship luxury installation loudspeaker system.
drivers: Flagship multi-way system with advanced amplification

lifestyle.alt: Firenze KX12F I in premium venue

name: K-array Mugello KH2P I
headline: Powered compact installation speaker
description: Mugello KH2P I combines Mugello design with integrated amplification for compact, high-performance installs.
story: The powered KH2P I brings the Mugello touring sound closer to architectural environments with simplified cabling.
definition: Powered compact Mugello loudspeaker for premium installations.

lifestyle.alt: Mugello KH2P I installed in venue

name: K-array Mugello KH3P I
headline: Mid-range powered installation speaker
description: Mugello KH3P I extends the Mugello range with more power and coverage for medium-scale installs.
story: Ideal for medium theatres and corporate venues needing Mugello performance without a full touring rig.
definition: Mid-sized powered Mugello loudspeaker for installations.
drivers: Enhanced multi-way system with integrated amplification

lifestyle.alt: Mugello KH3P I in medium venue

name: K-array Mugello KH5P I
headline: Flagship powered installation speaker
description: Mugello KH5P I is the flagship powered module for large, premium installations drawing on Mugello touring DNA.
story: Where touring-grade impact must live in a fixed venue, KH5P I brings the full Mugello experience to the install world.
definition: Flagship powered Mugello loudspeaker for large-scale installs.
drivers: High-performance multi-way system with premium amplification
